title: What is your favorite Sanam song? - Quora

response.answer_text: For those who don’t know about “SANAM”- the band. SANAM is an Indian pop rock band formed in 2013 and currently based in Mumbai. The main works of SANAM are the remake of old Bollywood songs. Most of their songs are light vocals on love and romance. Also known for their originals, they are also referred to as India's One Direction because of the quick rise in popularity. Band Members: Sanam Puri (lead vocalist/composer) Samar Puri (lyricist/lead guitar/composer) Venky S or Venkat Subramaniyam (bass guitar) Keshav Dhanraj (Drums/lead music arranger). The band is amongst India's top 10 independent YouTube Channels, India's biggest music artist on the digital platform and the fastest growing YouTube channel in the country. They have 5 Million Subscribers and more than 800 million views on YouTube Coming to SANAM’s best works with YouTube views: Gulabi Aankhein (93M) Mere Mehboob Qayamat Hogi (59M) Lag Jaa Gale (55M) O Mere Dil ke Chain (48M) Yeh Raatein Yeh Mausam (40M) Tujse Naraz (35M) Aap Ki Nazron ne samjha (35M) My personal favorite: Kora Kagaz tha ye man mera For all the sensational songs and quick links: https://huntsends.com/youtube-songs-sanam References: Wikipedia and YouTube

SANAM is an Indian pop rock band based in Mumbai, and is very popular for it’s remake songs of old classics. My favorite song of the band is Lag ja gale released in the year 2014, the song has both melody of old and the taste of new as well. This song takes me into a new world of my own and makes me feel so relaxed and pure. it is a song that i always keep on my playlist, and whenever i feel low, this song always makes me feel better.

Here are the best songs and most sensational songs sing by Sanam band. ITNI DOOR | #SANAMORIGINALIt is sanam’s original. Totally founded by sanam.Spreading love songDIL KYA KARE | SANAMIt is also a great cover crosses 8 million hitsShooted at a wonderful locationNEELE NEELE AMBAR PER | SANAMMost satisfying Video I have ever seenAgain with 15 million hitsAE KHUSH KI HUM | SANAMAgain with 10 million hitsMost emotional coverYEH RAAT BHEEGI BHEEGI | SANAMAgain with the 6 million hitsWith a Heart touching moon night atmosphereIf you want to enjoy these then, why are you waiting just go and just fall in love with music.

Rising from the scratch, Sanam Puri’s band is known for their old classic renditions along with some originals. They started in the year 2013 but took no time to rise to unprecedented fame. People enjoyed their efforts to relive the old Bollywood classics which are known for their evergreen aura. The band consists of: Sanam Puri, the Lead Vocalist/ ComposerSamar Puri, the Lead Guitarist/ Lyricist/ ComposerVenkat Subramaniyam, the Bass GuitaristKeshav Dhanraj, the Lead Music Arranger/ Drummer Hosting a flock of 5 million subscribers, Sanam Puri’s band ranks amongst the top 10 independent YouTube Channels in India. All of his songs are worth listening. Here is a link to some of my favorites which not just deserve an applause but will also hit your musical nerves. Link: https://huntsends.com/youtube-songs-sanam

My most favourite song by SANAM is Aaja Aaja.  Sanam - Aaja Aaja (Official Music Video) This song is a romantic pop song that brings about the feeling of love. Listening to it makes the listener feel as if a cool breeze is blowing and touching his/her body, making him/her refreshed. And though romantic, this song is not at all mushy - a smart song which can easily be the love anthem of our generation. There are more favourites, but as the question demands only one - I stick to Aaja Aaja.

Gulabi Aankhen | Sanam My favourite song of Sanam puri is ‘gulabi aankhe’. He has a magnificent voice and when he sings it sounds like a so pure. his voice so god blessed.his voice is god gifted. apart from his voice he has so many talents like he is a guitarist also and plays keyboard and bass. the way his band presents old songs with new version and music is fantastic.

My favorite song of the sanam band is LAG JAA GALE the cover sung by sanam. It is really great also if you wish to explore visut this link which is regularly updated and helps me.. find new and exciting stuff onehich i can rely. https://huntsends.com/youtube-songs-sanam

The song I fell in love with was “Mere Sapno ki Rani”. Well frankly, all the songs of SANAM are awesome and Sanam’s voice is just mesmerizing. Another song that I liked was “Channa Mereya”. The original song itself is good but SANAM’s cover for that song was just cherry on the cake. Also “Dil Diya Gallan” cover was heartwarming. And Sanam’s expressions while singing the songs are breathtaking. No wonder he is the youth sensation. https://huntsends.com/youtube-songs-sanam

My favourite song by Sanam Puri is ‘Mere Sapno Ki Rani’. One should listen to this sensational song song by Sanam and groove your feet to its tune. He has just created magic by doing a remake of this 80’s song. Just loved it.

From renditions….Gulaabi aankhein, Hai apna dil toh awara, Yeh wada raha and Pehla nasha make u fall in love with all four of them…although all their renditions create an all new air of charm around you. From playback songs, Sanam’s Ishq bulava takes you to a whole new world ;) one of the best bollywood romantic songs. Lucky tonight is a good party number as well.

My favorite song is “O mere dil ke Chain”. I liked the original one earlier, hence I heard the SANAM’s rendition of the song. They made it more beautiful. Top 10 Sanam Puri Songs - Fall In Love Uncontrollably...
Haa! SANAM my fav. Singer Kuch na kaho,teri aankhon se,ishq bulaava,dhat teri ki, ek ladki ko dekha toh aisa laga...... Beautiful voice
Teri Aankhon Se Apni Nazre Hatau Kaise- Sanam band with Jonita Gandhi(Acoustic Version). It is an extremely beautiful song :)
l love GARMI DI TUYEH VADA RAHALAG JA GALEISHTYLECHANNA MEREYAYEH RAAT BHEEGI BHEEEGIAND LIST GOES ON…….
MY FAVORITE SONG OF SANAM IS  PEHLA NASHAEK LADKI KO DEKHA TOJEE LE ZARA
